languages.text: "Так это ты... убил их... Убил их всех, кей-морагх! Еще и пытался сокрыть правду, как последний трус! Тебе следовало оставаться в той клетке до конца своих дней, вымаливая прощение у тех, кто погиб по твоей вине. Но ты пожелал спасения. А теперь... я убью тебя за предательство собственного мира!"

traits.locale_text: "Так это ты... убил их... Убил их всех, кей-мораг! Еще и пытался сокрыть правду, как последний трус! Тебе следовало оставаться в той клетке до конца своих дней, вымаливая прощение у тех, кто погиб по твоей вине. Но ты пожелал спасения. А теперь... я убью тебя за предательство собственного мира!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "So it was you... You killed them... You killed them all, kae-morag! And then you tried to hide the truth, like an abject coward! You should have remained in that cage until the end of your days, begging the forgiveness of those who died because of you. But you wanted to be rescued. And now... I am going to kill you for betraying your homeworld!"
languages.original_text: "Так это ты... убил их... Убил их всех, кей-морагх! Еще и пытался сокрыть правду, как последний трус! Тебе следовало оставаться в той клетке до конца своих дней, вымаливая прощение у тех, кто погиб по твоей вине. Но ты пожелал спасения. А теперь... я убью тебя за предательство собственного мира!"

I am going to kill you for betraying your homeworld!"

traits.locale_text: "So it was you... You killed them... You killed them all, kae-morag! And then you tried to hide the truth, like an abject coward! You should have remained in that cage until the end of your days, begging the forgiveness of those who died because of you. But you wanted to be rescued. And now... I am going to kill you for betraying your homeworld!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Así que fuiste tú... Tú los mataste... ¡Los mataste a todos, kae-morag! ¡Y luego intentaste ocultar la verdad, como un abyecto cobarde! Deberías haberte quedado en esa jaula hasta el fin de tus días, suplicando el perdón de los que murieron por tu culpa. Pero querías que te rescataran. Y ahora... ¡ahora te voy a matar por haber traicionado a tu mundo natal!».
languages.original_text: "So it was you... You killed them... You killed them all, kae-morag! And then you tried to hide the truth, like an abject coward! You should have remained in that cage until the end of your days, begging the forgiveness of those who died because of you. But you wanted to be rescued. And now... I am going to kill you for betraying your homeworld!"

traits.locale_text: «Así que fuiste tú... Tú los mataste... ¡Los mataste a todos, kae-morag! ¡Y luego intentaste ocultar la verdad, como un abyecto cobarde! Deberías haberte quedado en esa jaula hasta el fin de tus días, suplicando el perdón de los que murieron por tu culpa. Pero querías que te rescataran. Y ahora... ¡ahora te voy a matar por haber traicionado a tu mundo natal!».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「貴様だったのか…彼らを殺したのは…彼らを皆殺しにしたんだな、カエ＝モラグ！そして真実を隠そうとした。まるで臆病者のように！貴様は死ぬまで檻の中に残って、貴様のせいで死んだ者たちに許しを請うべきだった。しかし貴様は救われたかったのだ。ならば今.…故郷を裏切った貴様を我が殺してやる！」
languages.original_text: "So it was you... You killed them... You killed them all, kae-morag! And then you tried to hide the truth, like an abject coward! You should have remained in that cage until the end of your days, begging the forgiveness of those who died because of you. But you wanted to be rescued. And now... I am going to kill you for betraying your homeworld!"

traits.locale_text: 「貴様だったのか…彼らを殺したのは…彼らを皆殺しにしたんだな、カエ＝モラグ！そして真実を隠そうとした。まるで臆病者のように！貴様は死ぬまで檻の中に残って、貴様のせいで死んだ者たちに許しを請うべきだった。しかし貴様は救われたかったのだ。ならば今.…故郷を裏切った貴様を我が殺してやる！」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “原来是你……是你害死了他们……是你害死了他们所有人，你真该死！你还打算隐瞒真相，像个卑鄙的懦夫一样！你本该待在那个笼子里，直到生命的尽头，向那些被你害死的人道歉，可你却还想活下来。至于现在……我要杀了你，因为你背叛了你的家园！”
languages.original_text: "So it was you... You killed them... You killed them all, kae-morag! And then you tried to hide the truth, like an abject coward! You should have remained in that cage until the end of your days, begging the forgiveness of those who died because of you. But you wanted to be rescued. And now... I am going to kill you for betraying your homeworld!"

traits.locale_text: “原来是你……是你害死了他们……是你害死了他们所有人，你真该死！你还打算隐瞒真相，像个卑鄙的懦夫一样！你本该待在那个笼子里，直到生命的尽头，向那些被你害死的人道歉，可你却还想活下来。至于现在……我要杀了你，因为你背叛了你的家园！”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Alors, c'était vous... Vous les avez tués... Vous les avez tous tués, kae-morag ! Et puis, vous avez essayé de cacher la vérité, comme le lâche que vous êtes ! Vous auriez dû rester dans cette cage jusqu'à la fin de vos jours, à implorer le pardon de ceux qui sont morts par votre faute. Mais vous avez voulu être secouru. Et maintenant... je vais vous tuer pour avoir trahi votre patrie ! »
languages.original_text: "So it was you... You killed them... You killed them all, kae-morag! And then you tried to hide the truth, like an abject coward! You should have remained in that cage until the end of your days, begging the forgiveness of those who died because of you. But you wanted to be rescued. And now... I am going to kill you for betraying your homeworld!"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, c'était vous... Vous les avez tués... Vous les avez tous tués, kae-morag ! Et puis, vous avez essayé de cacher la vérité, comme le lâche que vous êtes ! Vous auriez dû rester dans cette cage jusqu'à la fin de vos jours, à implorer le pardon de ceux qui sont morts par votre faute. Mais vous avez voulu être secouru. Et maintenant... je vais vous tuer pour avoir trahi votre patrie ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr wart es also ... Ihr habt sie umgebracht ... Ihr habt sie alle umgebracht, Kae-Morag! Und dann wolltet ihr die Wahrheit verschleiern, wie ein erbärmlicher Feigling! Ihr hättet bis ans Ende Eurer Tage in diesem Käfig bleiben und um Verzeihung winseln sollen, da wegen Euch so viele sterben mussten. Aber Ihr wolltet gerettet werden. Und nun ... Werde ich Euch töten, da Ihr Eure Heimatwelt verraten habt!"
languages.original_text: "So it was you... You killed them... You killed them all, kae-morag! And then you tried to hide the truth, like an abject coward! You should have remained in that cage until the end of your days, begging the forgiveness of those who died because of you. But you wanted to be rescued. And now... I am going to kill you for betraying your homeworld!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wart es also ... Ihr habt sie umgebracht ... Ihr habt sie alle umgebracht, Kae-Morag! Und dann wolltet ihr die Wahrheit verschleiern, wie ein erbärmlicher Feigling! Ihr hättet bis ans Ende Eurer Tage in diesem Käfig bleiben und um Verzeihung winseln sollen, da wegen Euch so viele sterben mussten. Aber Ihr wolltet gerettet werden. Und nun ... Werde ich Euch töten, da Ihr Eure Heimatwelt verraten habt!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yani sen... Onları sen öldürdün... Hepsini sen öldürdün kae-morag! Sonra da aşağılık bir korkak gibi hakikati saklamaya çalıştın! Ölene dek o kafeste kalıp senin yüzünden ölenlerden af dilemen gerekirdi. Fakat sen kurtarılmak istedin. Şimdi ben de... Ana yurdumuza ihanet ettiğin için seni öldüreceğim!"
languages.original_text: "So it was you... You killed them... You killed them all, kae-morag! And then you tried to hide the truth, like an abject coward! You should have remained in that cage until the end of your days, begging the forgiveness of those who died because of you. But you wanted to be rescued. And now... I am going to kill you for betraying your homeworld!"

traits.locale_text: "Yani sendin... Onları sen öldürdün... Hepsini sen öldürdün kae-morag! Sonra da aşağılık bir korkak gibi hakikati saklamaya çalıştın! Senin yüzünden ölenlerden af dilendiğin günlerin sona erene dek o kafeste kalman gerekirdi. Ama sen, kurtarılmak istedin. Şimdi ben de... Ana yurdumuza ihanet ettiğin için seni öldüreceğim!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
